name: The King - A text-based tiny metroidvania
name_original: The King - A text-based tiny metroidvania
description:
A little text-based tiny metroidvania for CMD (windows) made by 3 students in Universidade Tiradentes.

Controls: 

A D - horizontal movement

Space - Jump

Team: Aerton Castro de Oliveira, Caio Correia de Moraes, João Paulo Fontes Vasconcelos.

System requirements:

-Windows

-.Net Framework 4
